remarks: Transitive law deduction for 'less than or equal to', 'less than'. (Contributed by NM, 8-Jan-2006.)
statement:
ltd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
ltd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
letrd.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
lelttrd.4 $e |- ( ph -> A <_ B ) $.
lelttrd.5 $e |- ( ph -> B < C ) $.
lelttrd $p |- ( ph -> A < C ) $.
